name: Auto Link
description: Automatically rewrite text matching a regular expression into a markdown link.

settings_schema.header: Configuration via the System Console isn't supported at this time. Please modify the config.json file directly. For more information please check the [README](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-autolink/blob/master/README.md#usage)
settings_schema.footer: * To report an issue, make a suggestion or a contribution, [check the repository](https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-plugin-autolink).
